body: Currently this functions are fully excluded from `c_api.cc` and `c_api.h` with their definitions in case we build TensorFlow for Android. Additionally, these exceptions are Java specific (like `NotSupportedOperationException`), so I can't throw them from `c_api.cc` anyway. Of course, I can throw another exception or status from `c_api.cc` and handle it in JNI converting into `NotSupportedOperationException`, but it looks like it will significantly complicate the solution, don't you think so?

Additionally, these exceptions are Java specific (like NotSupportedOperationException), so I can't throw them from c_api.cc anyway. Of course, I can throw another exception or status from c_api.cc and handle it in JNI converting into NotSupportedOperationException, but it looks like it will significantly complicate the solution, don't you think so?
